i1.name: Way of the Hunter
description: {{sbc|Innate - Intent:}} '''Yone''' doubles his {{as|{{sti|'''total''' critical strike chance}}}} from all other sources, but his {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} deal only {{as|{{critical damage|80|add=true}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.

{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Yone's''' {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} alternate between using his {{as|Steel Sword|Steel}} and {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}} {{tip|on-attack}}. '''Yone''' begins attacking with his {{as|Steel Sword|Steel}}, and basic attacks with the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}} deal {{as|50% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|50% AD}} {{as|magic damage}}.
i1.notes:
* There is no attack time out between alternating swords.
** It will ''persist through {{tip|death}}''.
** Only the cast of {{ai|Soul Unbound|Yone}} resets his next attack to restart the cycle.
* 50% of {{ii|Sheen|icononly = true}} {{nies|Spellblade}} and {{ri|Demolish}} damage will be converted to {{as|magic damage}} if applied by the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}}.
** This will also occur if applied by {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} ''Phantom Hit'' after having last attacked with the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}}.
** This will also occur if applied by {{ai|Mortal Steel|Yone}} after having last attacked with the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}}.{{bug}}
* The mixed damage is dealt in two simultaneous instances of damage, but will pretend to be a single instance for most effects (such as {{ris|Conqueror}} stacks).
** Even if the target dies from the {{as|physical damage}} dealt, the {{as|magic damage}} will still be applied to it.

q1.name: Mortal Steel
q1.target_range: {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|475|Thrust range}} / {{tt|450|Dash distance}} / {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|950|Whirlwind missile range}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' thrusts his {{as|Steel Sword}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit and applying {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects to the first enemy hit. ''Mortal Steel'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|60|add=true}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
If ''Mortal Steel'' hits an enemy with the thrust, '''Yone''' gains a ''Gathering Storm'' [[stack]] for 6 seconds, which refreshes upon receiving the second stack.

While '''Yone''' has two stacks of ''Gathering Storm'', the effect of ''Mortal Steel'' changes: the stacks are consumed and '''Yone''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the target direction and unleashes a whirlwind that moves in the same direction. The dash and the whirlwind both deal the same amount of damage to all enemies hit in their path and {{tip|airborne|knock them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, but they cannot affect the same target twice.

{{tt|''Mortal Steel's'' thrust|Not when at two stacks}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} if '''Yone''' is affected by [[Crowd_control#Loss_of_Control|total crowd control]] during the cast time but its {{sti|cooldown}} is reset to {{fd|0.1}} seconds.
q1.notes:
* ''Mortal Steel'' is not affected by {{ai|Way of the Hunter|Yone}}.
* ''Mortal Steel'' applies {{tip|basic damage}} for {{tt|the first (closest) enemy hit|including enemies hit by the dash}} and {{tip|area damage}} for secondary enemies:
** ''Mortal Steel'' will apply [[on-hit]] effects to the first target hit, but will not do so to the secondary ones.
** ''Mortal Steel'' will not apply [[ability effects|spell effects]] to the first target hit, but will do so to the secondary ones.
** {{stil|Spell vamp}} and {{ri|Ravenous Hunter}} will only grant {{tip|heal|healing}} from the damage dealt to secondary targets, and healing is reduced to 33% effectiveness, accordingly.
** {{stil|Life steal}} will heal based on the damage dealt to the first target hit.
* After a successful crit roll against one of the targets, ''Mortal Steel's'' thrust is guaranteed to {{tip|critically strike}} all further targets aswell.{{bug}}
** This is unlike the behaviour of {{cai|Steel Tempest|Yasuo}}.
** The whirlwind and dash roll their critical strike against each target individually.
* {{tip|Blink|Blinking}} during ''Mortal Steel's'' cast with two stacks of ''Gathering Storm'' (after the cast time) will end the dash prematurely but enemies in range of '''Yone''' at the new location are affected. The whirlwind's trajectory cannot be changed once it has already been unleashed.
* Only the whirlwind can be {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}.
* Each parry has different interactions with this ability, whether it's the first target of ''Mortal Steel'' or the secondary one. In either case '''Yone''' still gains a stack of ''Gathering Storm'' and his whirlwind {{tip|airborne|knock up}} cannot be negated by parries:
** {{tip|Dodge}} and {{tip|Block}}: first target '''does not''' deal damage, secondary target '''does''' deal damage.
** {{tip|Blind}}: both first target and secondary target deal damage.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent '''Yone''' from receiving a stack.
* ''Mortal Steel'' is disabled while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} if '''Yone''' has two stacks of ''Gathering Storm''.
* While at two stacks, a range indicator will be shown for the effective range of the whirlwind.
* The {{tip|dash}} can cross terrain.
* ''Mortal Steel'' will cast from wherever '''Yone''' is at the end of the cast time.
** '''Yone''' will always cast ''Mortal Steel'' in his facing direction, and he will turn to face the target direction at the start of the cast time. While at two stacks, '''Yone''' will always cast it in the target direction.

w1.name: Spirit Cleave
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' cleaves with his {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}} in the target direction, dealing equal parts {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage to all enemies hit in a cone. The '''total''' mixed damage has a minimum threshold of {{pp|30+10*x for 8;then + 20*x for 5;then + 40*x for 5|formula=30 + 10 per level until lvl 8, then + 20 per level until lvl 13, then + 40 per level}} against {{tip|minions}} and a maximum threshold of {{pp|140+10*x for 18|formula=140 + 10 per level}} against {{tip|monsters}}.

'''Yone''' {{tip|shield|shields}} himself for {{passive progression/deprecated version|40 to 60}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds if ''Spirit Cleave'' hits an enemy, increased by {{passive progression/deprecated version|5|100 to 200|1 to 5|changedisplay=true|label1=number of enemy champions hit|label2=shield increase|key=%}}, up to a shield for {{passive progression/deprecated version|40*3 to 60*3}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}.
w1.notes:
* Despite ''Spirit Cleave'' generally hitting targets' {{tip|edge range}}, it ''cannot'' hit targets whose center is behind him.
** This behaviour is common with [[Projectile|missiles]], however some cone spells such as this one also do it.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent '''Yone''' from receiving and/or increasing the {{tip|shield}}.
* ''Spirit Cleave'' will cast from wherever '''Yone''' is at the end of the cast time.
** '''Yone''' will always cast ''Spirit Cleave'' in his facing direction, and he will turn to face the target direction at the start of the cast time.
* The mixed damage is applied in two instances, and the {{as|physical damage}} will be dealt first within the same game tick.
** If the {{as|physical damage}} finishes off the unit, the {{as|magic damage}} will not be dealt against it.{{bug}}

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ {{ap|11 to 15}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Physical Damage|{{ap|5 to 25}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5.5 to 7.5}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Magic Damage|{{ap|5 to 25}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5.5 to 7.5}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
effects.str:
• Total Mixed Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health)
  • Physical Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health)
  • Magic Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health)

e1.name: Soul Unbound
e1.target_range: {{tt|300|Initial dash range and body distance in the opposite direction}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the target direction, gaining ''Spirit Form'' as well as creating an {{tip|untargetable}} {{tip|clone}} that is sent the same distance behind the cast location, though not through terrain, and lasts until the ability fully ends. ''Soul Unbound'' can be recast within 5 seconds after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, and is automatically done so when the duration ends.

{{sbc|Spirit Form:}} '''Yone''' becomes {{tip|ghosted}}, gains {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|11|10 to 30|0 to 3|key=%|type=time active|label1=time since the start of the dash|label2=bonus movement speed}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and ''marks'' champions damaged with [[basic attack]]s or [[champion ability|abilities]]. Each ''mark'' stores a percentage of the {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} damage that '''Yone''' deals to them with his basic attacks and abilities.
Activation resets {{ais|Way of the Hunter|Yone}} current state.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Yone''' casts for {{fd|0.25}} seconds then {{tip|dashes}} back to his {{tip|clone}}, ending ''Spirit Form'' and detonating the ''marks'' on each champion to deal {{as|true damage}} equal to the amount stored against each of them. '''Yone''' is {{tip|displacement immune}} from the point of reactivation until the dash is completed and, at the end of the {{tt|cast time|0.25 seconds cast before dashing}}, he will {{tip|cleanse}} himself from all {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects that were applied to him during the cast time as well as all {{tip|blind|blinds}}, {{tip|cripple|cripples}} and {{tip|drowsy}} effects.

The automatic recast is delayed if '''Yone''' is unable to recast ''Soul Unbound'' under any circumstances, which includes if he cannot move or cast abilities. ''Soul Unbound'' will also immediately recast upon '''Yone's''' {{tip|death}}.

r1.name: Fate Sealed
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' prepares a strike over the cast time, then ''marks'' all enemies in a line in the target direction and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for 1 second as well as {{tip|blink|blinking}} {{tt|200 units|Can place him beyond maximum range}} beyond the center of the last enemy champion struck. If no enemy champions are struck, '''Yone''' {{tip|blink|blinks}} to {{tt|maximum range|Uses center range}} instead.

After {{fd|0.125}} seconds, wind then rushes along the same line, dealing ''marked'' enemies that are within the area equal parts {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage while {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them towards '''Yone's''' blinking position and subsequently {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
'''Yone''' is {{tip|lockout|locked out}} of performing actions for a total of {{fd|0.3}} seconds upon blinking.
''The {{tip|stun}} ends prematurely upon the knock up.''
r1.notes:
* ''Marked'' enemies that are not within the area will not be affected by the second portion of the ability.
* If ''Fate Sealed's'' maximum range is inside terrain, enemies will not be {{tip|airborne|pulled}} through walls.
* ''Fate Sealed'' '''can''' hit targets whose center is behind '''Yone''', if their {{tip|edge range|radius}} overlaps with the rectangle hitbox in front of him.
* Enemies are {{tip|airborne|pulled}} with 3000 speed.
* ''Fate Sealed'' will cast from wherever '''Yone''' is at the end of the cast time.
* '''Yone''' can blink up to 1200 units + enemy [[size]], if the last enemy champion's radius intersects with the maximum range slightly.
* The mixed damage is applied in two instances, and the {{as|magic damage}} will be dealt first within the same game tick.
** If the {{as|magic damage}} finishes off the unit, the {{as|physical damage}} will not be dealt against it.{{bug}}
* {{tip|Spell shield}} can block either the initial {{tip|stun}} or the damage, pull, and {{tip|airborne|knock up}}. Both can only be blocked separately.{{bug|2}}
** The ''mark'' cannot be prevented.
* The {{tip|airborne|knock up}} starts once the pull ends.
* '''Yone''' will not become {{tip|suppression|suppressed}} by {{ai|The Show Stopper|Sett}} at the very end of ''Fate Sealed's'' cast time if he blinks to another champion.
* '''Yone''' is {{tip|lockout|locked out}} of performing actions for {{fd|0.3}} seconds after the cast time. ''Fate Sealed'' is not cancelled if '''Yone''' dies during this time.
** The following table refers for interactions while '''Yone''' is ''locked-out'' and in cast time:
{{ct|attack=false|cast=false|move=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=revival-false}}
